title: srI raama raama seethA
sahitya:
shrI rAma rAma sItA hrjjaladhi sOma

caraNam 1

 nI pAdamula bhakti niNDAruga nosagi kApADu nA pApa mEpaTi rAma
   
caraNam 2

 pAliki konnALLu ipuDu paluka kuNDina viDutunA kula marmulella dalaci nanu brOvavayya
   
caraNam 3

 palumAru ninnu pADi pADi vEDukonnAnu kala kalamani nAtO baluka vEmayya ipuDu
   
caraNam 4

 lOkula nera nammukonaka nI pAdamu linDAka nAmadi nunca krIgaNTa jUceda vEmi
   
caraNam 5

 rAjashEkhara dEvarAja bhava pUjArhi shrI tyAgarAju mora lAlinci
